title: Interpretation of seeing eating sweets in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eating sweets in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, eating sweets in a dream is one of the positive dreams that have reported many promising interpretations related to it, especially in the books of dream interpreters, of the greats and the greats. Hassan - the well-known scholar Ibn Sirin and the scholar Al-Nabulsi, who provided many interpretations of various dreams, which are considered among the most widespread interpretations, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of what you see in sweets. A dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing sweets in a dream as a sign of goodness and blessing. If a man sees in a dream that he is buying sweets and eating them, then this dream indicates a feeling of psychological comfort with stability. Eating a lot of sweets in a dream is a sign of abundant sustenance and many blessings for the dreamer. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating sweets and enjoying the taste, then this dream shows his fairness and ability to distinguish between right and wrong. Eating eastern and western sweets in a dream indicates the fortuneteller’s happiness and joy. To see yourself eating large quantities of sweets, this indicates the approaching Gulf and the loss of sorrows and worries. The great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says in his book Interpretation of Dreams that seeing sweets in a dream symbolizes the arrival of sustenance, goodness, and blessings in the life of the dreamer. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is eating sweets Eastern, then this is good news to hear the preaching that will bring joy to his heart in the near future. But if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is eating a lot of sweets, this is a sign that he will obtain great livelihood in the coming period. If a man dreams while he is sleeping that he is eating sweets and they taste delicious Very, this dream indicates that the fortuneteller is fair and distinguishes between lies and truth. If the dreamer dreams that he is eating sweets greedily, this is a sign that the dreamer will get a lot of money in the coming period. Eating sweets greedily in a dream portends the dreamer the death of his worries and sorrows. If The sleeper saw in his dream that he buys sweets and then eats them, then this is a good vision that indicates the psychological stability, peace of mind, and peace of mind that the dreamer enjoys. Interpretation of the dream of eating sweets in a dream, Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. According to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretations, eating sweets in a dream indicates recovery from illness in the event of Illness in reality, as it indicates the approach of relief and the removal of worries. Contrary to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, Al-Nabulsi interpreted the greedy consumption of sweets as a sign of illness and stress. Eating sweets with honey symbolizes marriage if the dreamer is single. Eating sweets containing dates indicates closeness to God and loyalty to obey Him, and God knows best. Imam Nabulsi says that if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is eating sweets and is suffering from worries in reality, then this vision portends the end of his worries. And if the dreamer is suffering from an illness and sees in his dream that he is eating sweets, this is a good vision that promises him recovery from an illness In pain

title: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a kitchen and a dirty kitchen in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dirty kitchen and cleaning the kitchen in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, to wash the dirty kitchen, a spacious kitchen, washing the floor of the old kitchen to remove grease from the cooker for Ibn Sirin and Fahd Al-Osaimi, and more explanations in the continuation of the article below. Seeing a dirty kitchen and cleaning the kitchen in a dream is one of the dreams that cause us a lot of confusion and anxiety, due to the many interpretations that exist about it in different interpretations and according to all interpreters, and the kitchen is one of the important topics and places in our public life in which we prepare and cook food constantly to eat the most delicious food and seeing it has a number of meanings, the most important of which are psychological interpretations, due to a person thinking about food. Interpretation of the kitchen and its cleaning if it is clean or dirty Cleaning the kitchen in a dream is one of the symbols that indicate the dreamer's personality and his social and psychological state Seeing a dirty kitchen in a dream means anxiety, turmoil, confusion and misunderstanding If you see yourself cleaning a dirty kitchen, this means escaping from problems and fears Seeing the kitchen in a dream in different ways, entering the kitchen in a dream causes problems and the viewer will have to deal with them Washing dishes in a dream is moving forward Making things and seeing Seeing our kitchen clean is a relief after fatigue Cooking food, if possible, is a livelihood that depends on the type of food If a single girl sees herself cleaning the kitchen, this is a sign of liberation from the worries and crises of that period As for seeing the kitchen clean of dirt in a dream, it is a sign of getting rid of worries and problems Seeing yourself cleaning the kitchen in a dream is a sign of an easy birth for a pregnant woman Seeing yourself cleaning the kitchen in a dream is a sign of getting rid of problems and crises Al-Nabulsi, the famous and well-known dream interpreter, explained to us in his various interpretations that a dirty kitchen and cleaning the kitchen have important meanings and implications that the dreamer must know correctly without misunderstanding. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the kitchen and a dirty kitchen in a dream A girl who sees a clean and tidy kitchen in a dream shows her calmness and the end of problems. As for seeing the kitchen in a dream, it shows some things that a person thinks about in public life, especially women. A married woman seeing her kitchen clean and properly arranged in a dream is a sign of great marital happiness. And the female vision of the kitchen is evidence of constant thinking about the dishes prepared for the family and household. A married woman seeing the kitchen unkempt and excessively dirty is evidence of Psychological crises and fears that she will go through in her life. Cooking food in a dream is an indication of the positive and good things coming to the dreamer, which should be paid attention to. Seeing an unmarried woman in the kitchen in a dream is evidence of her psychological state and the bad mood she is currently experiencing. A single woman preparing food in the kitchen in a dream is evidence of her steadfastness in living and obtaining what she seeks in life. A girl entering the kitchen in a dream is a sign of great goodness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about offering soap in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving soap in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about giving soap in a dream. It is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream, even if it is a sign of good or evil. The dream and its good interpretation is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream of offering soap in a dream may indicate giving A gift of soap in a dream indicates the goodness and piety that the person having the vision enjoys in his life at that time. It is possible that seeing someone giving a gift of soap in a dream indicates a new life that may happen to the visionary in the coming days, thanks to God. In the event that the person sees That he received a gift of soap in a dream, this may be an indication of the abundance of money and a great living that the dreamer can obtain during this period, thanks to God. In the event that someone sees that he received soap as a gift in a dream, this may mean that you are taking advice from people Others, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving someone candy in a dream Giving candy in a dream may indicate the love that exists between you and God knows best. A person’s dream that he received candy from another person in a dream may indicate his closeness to him in those days, thanks to God. In the event that there is A vision of giving someone sweets in a dream, could indicate the abundance of goodness and wide life that the dreamer can receive during this time, and God knows best. In the event that one sees that he received sweets as a gift from another person in a dream, it may be a sign of happiness and kindness that It may happen to the dreamer in the coming days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving a prayer piece of paper in a dream: A dream about a gift of prayer clothes in a dream may indicate the person’s preaching during these days. In the event that you see the gift of a prayer cloth in a dream, this may indicate positive changes that occur to the vision in His life during those days. It is possible that seeing prayer clothes as a gift in a dream indicates happy events that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Seeing prayer clothes being presented in a dream could be positive developments that occur to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about serving dishes in a dream: Giving away empty dishes in a dream may indicate some problems and obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life and must be prevented. A dream about someone giving a white dish in a dream may indicate the joy and happiness that comes from the dreamer, thanks to God. In If he sees himself giving utensils and dishes in a dream, this may indicate the ample livelihood that the dreamer may gain in his life at that time. Whoever sees in his dream that he received a dish as a gift in the dream, this may indicate the affection and respect that he enjoys in the eyes of that person, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving a black dress in a dream: Gifting a black dress in a dream can indicate good luck and success in life in general. A person’s dream that he received a black dress as a gift in a dream may indicate a job that the dreamer will obtain in his life in the coming days. Dreaming of taking off a black dress as a gift in a dream may indicate change

title: Interpretation of a dream about my child getting married in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that my child got married in a dream. There are many meanings that may express what you see, so in the following lines we learn about the interpretation of a dream that my child got married in a dream and what it brings, good or bad. ..Interpretation of a dream about my child getting married in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that my child is getting married in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing the husband as a child can lead to prestige and power, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees marrying a child in his dream, it may be a sign of... A bright future, and God knows best. It can also express work and profit, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams that my child was kidnapped in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my son being kidnapped in a dream. Kidnapping a son could be a sign of getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his son being kidnapped by an unknown person, it may lead to This leads to things that are not good, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees a stranger kidnapping her son, this may lead to evil that befalls her wife and her family, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams that my child died in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that my son died in a dream. The death of a son can indicate salvation from enemies, God willing. When You see the death of a child, it can lead to trouble and judgment, and God knows the unseen. The death of a child can also reflect wrong decisions, and God knows the unseen, while the death of a son may indicate that the machinations of enemies have been thwarted by God’s grace, and God is Most High and Most Knowing.Interpretation of a dream that my child is sick in a dreamInterpretation Dreaming that my child is sick in a dream. A child’s illness could be a sign of difficulties, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a sick child can express exposure to injustice, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a sick child who is not one of her children, this may be a sign of distress and worsening of her financial condition, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a sick child in a dream can express some unpleasant things, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my child talking in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that my child talks in a dream could be a sign of his long life, and God knows the unseen. It can also be said that he is one of those who speak and advise people, and God knows the unseen. When you see an infant speaking To the sinner in a dream, this may be a sign of good health, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees a child speaking, this may be a sign of goodness and blessing, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams that my child is vomiting in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that my child is vomiting in a dream, and the child’s vomiting can express Envy, and God knows the unseen, since if the dreamer sees the vomiting of a child he knows, it could lead to troubles and difficulties, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the vomiting of an unknown child, it may indicate goodness and nourishment, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream that my child is taking drugs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that my child is taking drugs in a dream. Drug use by the son may indicate that he is obtaining money illegally, and God knows the unseen. When you see a son using drugs in a dream, this may be a sign of evil deeds, and God knows the unseen, as drug use can indicate weakness and walking in the wrong.

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in my hair by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in my hair: It is one of the dreams that raises terror and anxiety for its owner because it is a harmful and unpleasant insect. Many of the Imams’ interpreters have spoken about this dream and given different interpretations in it, but it is basically an unpleasant vision because it symbolizes evil and evil and negative thoughts. The interpretation of this dream depends on A woman who sees lice in her hair and gets rid of them in dreams symbolizes the end of anxiety and the removal of worries and sorrows, and a dream of lice in her hair leads to failure, whether at the level of study or in application. Practical. Professional life. Seeing lice in a woman's hair usually portends some good things and events for the dreamer, provided that she kills and gets rid of her. A dreamer who sees lice in the hair of a sick person in a dream is a sign of deteriorating health and a prolonged period of illness. White lice in a woman's hair symbolizes separation To improve her life, some separation and living with stability and peace of mind. Interpretation of a dream about lice in my hair by Ibn Sirin Head lice leads to an increase in obstacles and crises that the viewer is exposed to in his life. A dream about lice in hair symbolizes the deterioration of the fortuneteller’s financial condition and is a sign that things are deteriorating for the worse. When you see The wife has lice in her dream. This is a sign of the many burdens and responsibilities that burden her relationship and she needs support from her husband. Seeing white lice in the hair is evidence of abundant sustenance and the arrival of abundant blessings to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about lice in my hair for a single woman: Seeing a virgin girl with lice in her hair indicates That the corrupt person is close to her and is trying to trap her, and she must deal with him with greater caution in the coming period. If a girl who has never been married sees lice in her dream, this is a sign that the dreamer controls her negative feelings and lives in peace and tranquility. Killing the lice on her head is evidence of This girl is far from bad friends, and the dream of lice multiplying in her hair leads her to commit many obligatory and forbidden duties. Interpretation of the dream of lice in my hair for a married woman: A woman who sees herself in a dream picking lice from her hair and expelling them from the dream, which symbolizes falling into some sins and temptations. A woman who sees in her dream that her hair is covered with lice is one of the dreams that leads to committing forbidden things and failing in obligations and acts of obedience. A woman who sees lice in her hair biting her dreams indicate the presence of some enemies around her. A woman’s dream of having lice in her hair indicates that she will fall into... Many obstacles and crises, whether financially or in social relationships. When a woman sees lice walking in her hair and moving around in her clothes, it is a dream that symbolizes her obtaining a prominent position at work, and if she is not working, this indicates a high standard of living for her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream Lice in my hair for a pregnant womanSeeing a pregnant woman with lice in her hair is often considered a praiseworthy dream

title: The 50 most accurate interpretations of a dream about scorpions in the house

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the home: Seeing scorpions in a dream is one of the visions that angers many people. Whoever sees it feels anxious, terrified, and confused whether it will bring him good or evil, but the imams of interpretation have cited many interpretations regarding this vision and seeing scorpions. It varies in a dream depending on the situation the scorpions are in, as well as the difference of opinion. Let us learn about seeing scorpions in a dream through our special Egyptian website. Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the house. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he sees scorpions inside his house. This is evidence that the dreamer has gone through many obstacles and crises in his life, but God will relieve him soon. But if he sees that there are scorpions walking on the wall of his house in a dream. This vision indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many problems that he will be able to solve and overcome later. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the scorpion in a dream is the dreamer’s enemy who is pursuing him and conspiring against him until he falls into successive troubles and crises. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing a scorpion in a dream. It indicates the worries and sorrow to which the dreamer is exposed and suffers in his life. It is also believed that the scorpion in the house indicates the presence of a man walking among people. Al-Nabulsi believes that the presence of a scorpion on the dreamer’s shirt is evidence of the presence of an enemy near his source of livelihood who wants to harm him. Ibn Shaheen believes Seeing a scorpion in the house stinging people is evidence that the dreamer is gossiping among people. Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the house by Ibn Sirin The distinguished Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin sees different interpretations regarding seeing scorpions in the house. Its interpretation varies according to the circumstances of the dreamer and the context of the vision, as we explain in the following points: If the dreamer sees in a dream that there is a scorpion inside his house and it is on fire. This is evidence of the dreamer’s victory and salvation from his enemies. The same applies to whoever sees in his dream that he is holding a scorpion and then throws that scorpion at a specific woman. This dream indicates that the dreamer committed a sinful act and committed forbidden acts with this woman. But if the dreamer sees that he carries scorpions in his stomach in a dream. This dream indicates the presence of enemies very close to the dreamer, who may be from his family. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is eating scorpion meat while it is raw or uncooked. This is evidence that the fortuneteller makes his living from forbidden things. According to Ibn Sirin, seeing a scorpion in the dreamer’s dream. It shows that he has gone through successive major crises, but he will be able to overcome them and emerge from his ordeal safely. He also sees that whoever dreams of killing a scorpion inside his house. This is evidence of getting rid of his problems and achieving his desires and desires in life in the coming period. Seeing a scorpion inside the pants in a dream means that the dreamer is purchasing a corrupt and immoral woman. Also, seeing a scorpion on the bed in a dream indicates the wife’s corruption and immorality, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in Home for Single WomenSeeing a scorpion in the house in an unmarried girl’s dream carries many interpretations that we can offer for the following issues: If an unmarried girl sees that there is a scorpion in her house in a dream. This dream indicates that there is someone close to this girl who is being followed by Dr

title: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see rain falling in a dream or dream, interpretation of seeing rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin, different interpretations of seeing rain in a dream, rain is one of the things that many people are optimistic about, as it is food from God Almighty that nourishes the earth, grows fruits, fills wells and benefits People, including, and in the interpretation of seeing rain, there are many different interpretations that we presented through the article to us today, through the Roya website. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing rain in a dream indicates great wealth and many good things. Seeing rain falling in the dreamer’s dream when the traveler returns Or his absence from his family. Seeing you sitting at home while it is raining. Benefit from large financial gains. Seeing the rain falling hard on the head shows a lack of self-confidence. Watching the rain falling hard and hard. It symbolizes the dreamer’s strength and ability to get rid of his enemies. Seeing rain and a rainbow in a dream indicates receiving good news. And success and stability in life. When seeing that the rain has stopped, the sun shines and the day becomes clear, it indicates the end of worries, sorrows, problems, and the end of disputes. Interpretation of seeing heavy rain in a dream. Seeing heavy rain in the dreamer’s dream indicates the teleological response of his family. Seeing a married woman raining in a dream announces her desire to Childbearing and God’s response to it. A man seeing it rains abundantly indicates that he will obtain a position and money. Seeing heavy rain in a dream for a single woman indicates the end of worries and the end of problems. Interpretation of seeing rain in the summer in a dream. Seeing rain in a summer dream indicates the prosperity of the land, crops and fruits. Seeing rain in the summer Summer spoils crops in a dream. Reporting the occurrence of an epidemic and the spread of disease in the city. Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream. Dreaming of walking in the rain. It indicates the end of worries and the end of problems. Seeing walking in the rain for the deprived indicates the fulfillment of one’s desires and obtaining comfort after hardship. Interpretation of seeing rain falling on a person in A dream about seeing rain falling on the dreamer and not on the rest of the people indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money in the coming period. Seeing the rain falling on a person and not on the rest indicates a project or trade that he establishes or participates in that earns him a lot of profits. Interpretation of a dream of heavy rain at night: Seeing heavy rain falling in The night indicates wealth after poverty and the acquisition of many possessions. Seeing heavy rain falling in a dream at night indicates the death of sadness, anxiety and worries. Seeing heavy rain falling at night in a dream indicates the recovery of those who were sick and enjoying good health. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a woman An unmarried woman sees rain falling in a dream. It indicates the good that she will obtain. Seeing rain in a dream for a single woman indicates her relationship with a person of knowledge and religion and is characterized by tenderness and sincerity. A woman seeing rain accompanied by thunder and lightning shows her fear of something in her life. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a woman For a married woman, seeing rain is a solution

title: Interpretation of fluid coming out of the vagina in a dream and seeing a woman’s water in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of fluid coming out of the vagina shows the end of worry and sadness, and other interpretations that we will explain to single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced men, and men, such as rejection of ovulation. Uterine water is black, yellow, or red, and seeing vaginal secretions by Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and others in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of fluid coming out of the vagina in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, said: A woman’s fluids or water coming out of her vagina can indicate a benefit, money, or a child in Reality. Whoever sees in his dream that it is stained with a woman’s semen, or with water coming out of her vagina in a dream, will benefit from it in wakefulness. Whoever sees in his dream that fluid or water coming out of his wife’s vagina in the dream is its natural color, then his vision indicates that his wife will give birth in the coming days. The next few, God willing. If the color of this liquid or water is yellow, then the vision indicates the birth of this boy with certain diseases and health conditions. But if the color of the woman’s liquid or water is red like blood, then the vision shows a short lifespan for that child. If the color of the liquid is black, The vision indicates the birth of a boy who will have an excellent status among the parents and family members, and these same indicators apply to the woman’s vision in these cases. The woman who sees in her dream liquid coming out in the form of fire from her vagina, or the husband who sees in his dream liquid coming out of his wife’s vagina. In the form of fire, the vision indicates birth. The son who rises above him in society and becomes the holder of rule, position, and authority in the state, but he will be unjust and oppressive to the people. And whoever sees in her dream that she is releasing a fish from her vagina instead of fluid, then her vision indicates the birth of a son who will live a long time. Interpretation of fluid coming out of the vagina in a dream for a son Sirin Interpretation of seeing fluid coming out of the womb in a dream: This vision indicates the existence of some problems with the husband for a married woman. Sometimes it symbolizes a married or single woman, and this vision symbolizes freedom from worries and some problems. Any exit from the body in a dream means the removal of worries, God willing, Blessed and Most High. Sometimes, seeing fluid coming out of the uterus indicates that you have passed a stage and that the stage you were in was a difficult and challenging stage, and you will overcome this stage thanks to God Almighty. As for seeing secretions coming out of the vagina, and these secretions are abundant, this vision indicates... Success and excellence in her professional life, God willing, may God bless her, and this is for an unmarried girl. As for a married woman, discharge from the vagina in a dream, this vision indicates that the doors of livelihood will open in her person, God willing, the Blessed and Most High. Sometimes this vision indicates relief, and sometimes this vision indicates the end of Problems with the husband, God willing. The most beautiful meanings
